channel.title: FAA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in FAA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump orders cull of regulations governing commercial rocket launches
item.description: The head of the FAA’s commercial spaceflight division will become a political appointee.

item.title: Rocket Report: Channeling the future at Wallops; SpaceX recovers rocket wreckage
item.description: China’s Space Pioneer seems to be back on track a year after an accidental launch.
